snippet: In this new series, Chris Labzda and Bon Duke, the co-founders of the New York Fashion Film Festival, curate a short film each week for T. This week’s installment: A collage of classics overlaid with sound from Lauren Wolkstein’s “Social...
abstract: In this new series, Chris Labzda and Bon Duke, the co-founders of the New York Fashion Film Festival, curate a short film each week for T. This week’s installment: A collage of classics overlaid with sound from Lauren Wolkstein’s “Social Butterfly.”

byline.original: By CHRIS LABZDA and BON DUKE

headline.main: A Montage of Iconic New Wave Movies, Via the New York Fashion Film Festival
